en.aboutHome.cta_safe: Ask with mercy, science, philosophy, engineeringâ€¦
en.safe.about_title: Abqeri Safe-AI â€” Interpretable Intelligence with Mercy
en.safe.about_p1: Abqeriâ€™s Safe-AI anchors safety at the hardware and algorithmic levels. Decisions are traceable, rules are visible, and outcomes optimize for human dignity and responsibility.
en.safe.bul1: Chip-level & algorithmic guardrails â€” not bolt-on filters.
en.safe.bul2: Explainable by default â€” visible steps and references.
en.safe.bul3: Mercy objectives â€” align with safety for people and society.
en.safe.bul4: Local & sustainable â€” hybrid compute reduces data center burden.
en.music.about_p1: Rule-guided composition you can see and teach. Sliders and scales, not black-box tricks.
en.universe.about_title: Einstein Was Right â€” A Hands-On Resolution
en.universe.quote1: â€œGod does not play dice with the universe.â€ â€” Albert Einstein
en.about.p1: Abqeri builds safe, interpretable AI and hybrid computing to serve humanityâ€”especially the forgotten and oppressed. We align research with mercy and accountability.
en.about.zakat_p1: Weâ€™re for-profit for the sake of the poor: revenue minus transparent costs â†’ posted in near real time â†’ distributed to vetted NGOs. Salaries are modest and public.
en.about.invite_p1: To scientists and philosophers: use these tools to resolve century-old paradoxes and help redirect budgets and influence toward the urgent needs of humanityâ€”children, orphans, the vulnerable.
en.about.einstein_title: Einstein & the End of Aimless Science
en.about.einstein_dice: â€œGod does not play dice with the universe.â€ â€” Albert Einstein
en.about.einstein_end: (Often attributed) â€œIf we truly understood quantum mechanics, it would be the end of science.â€ We offer a practical path to that understandingâ€”so discovery can serve compassion.
en.pricing.title: Abqeri â€” Pricing
en.pricing.free_p: Basic access to Safe-AI, Music-AI demos, read-only Ledger.
en.pricing.lite_p: More prompts per day, advanced Music-AI presets.
en.pricing.plus_p: Hybrid-QPU demo access (Bell state), priority queue.
en.pricing.lab_p: Research features, API, Universe experiment export.
en.pricing.patron_p: Sponsorships that directly support NGOs via our ledger.
en.ledger.title: Abqeri â€” Public Ledger
en.ledger.note: Live profit = revenue âˆ’ (infrastructure + R&D + modest salaries). NGO transfers show within hours; CSV export available.
